verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7873'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7874'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ حِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14153'>نٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14154'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14155'>ن ش</tajweed>َيْـ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14156'>ـًٔا م</tajweed>َّذْكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hal atāka 'alal-insāni ḥīnum minad-dahri lam yakun syai'am mażkūrā(n).
verses.translation: Ужель над человеком не прошел Тот долгий срок, когда он был ничем

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5159'>قْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7228'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7325'>ِن ن</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7326'>طْ</tajweed>فَةٍ أَمْشَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14157'>جٍ ن</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14158'>بْ</tajweed>تَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ سَمِيع<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':2864'>َۢا ب</tajweed>َصِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā khalaqnal-insāna min nuṭfatin amsyājin nabtalīhi fa ja'alnāhu samī'am baṣīrā(n).
verses.translation: Мы человека сотворили Из капли смеси; Чтоб испытать его, Мы одарили его зрением и слухом

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا هَدَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14159'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّبِيلَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا شَاكِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14160'>رًا و</tajweed>َإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا كَفُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā hadaināhus-sabīla immā syākiraw wa immā kafūrā(n).
verses.translation: И Мы (всеведением Нашим) Определили ему путь: Быть благодарным (Господу) или неверным

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2660'>دْ</tajweed>نَا لِلْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرِينَ سَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>سِلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَأَغْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14161'>اً و</tajweed>َسَعِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā a'tadnā lil-kāfirīna salāsila wa aglālaw wa sa'īrā(n).
verses.translation: Назначили Мы для неверных Ярмо, оковы и пылающий Огонь

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14162'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14163'>بْ</tajweed>رَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14164'>ن ك</tajweed>َأْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14165'>سٍ ك</tajweed>َانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-abrāra yasyrabūna min ka'sin kāna mizājuhā kāfūrā(n).
verses.translation: А праведные будут пить из чаш Напиток с добавлением кафура

verses.text_uthmani: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14166'>نًا ي</tajweed>َشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14167'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Ainay yasyrabu bihā 'ibādullāhi yufajjirūnahā tafjīrā(n).
verses.translation: Что из источника служителей Аллаха Струею льется непрерывной

verses.text_uthmani: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُوفُونَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14168'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14169'>مًا ك</tajweed>َانَ شَرُّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yūfūna bin-nażri wa yakhāfūna yauman kāna syarruhū mustaṭīrā(n).
verses.translation: Они свои обеты исполняют, Страшася Дня, когда (расплата за грехи) (В тот День) Поглотит всех и вся

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14170'>طْ</tajweed>عِمُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14171'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مِسْكِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14172'>نًا و</tajweed>َيَتِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14173'>مًا و</tajweed>َأَسِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yuṭ'imūnaṭ-ṭa'āma 'alā ḥubbihī miskīnaw wa yatīmaw wa asīrā(n).
verses.translation: Вздыхая о еде, они накормят все ж И сироту, и пленника, и бедняка

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا نُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14174'>طْ</tajweed>عِمُكُمْ لِوَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14175'>جْ</tajweed>هِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14176'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14177'>ءً و</tajweed>َلَا شُكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innamā nuṭ'imukum liwajhillāhi lā nurīdu minkum jazā'aw wa lā syukūrā(n).
verses.translation: Мы кормим вас лишь для того, Чтобы снискать довольствие Аллаха, Не требуя ни благодарности от вас, ни воздаянья

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَخَافُ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':10191'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14178'>سًا ق</tajweed>َمْطَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā nakhāfu mir rabbinā yauman 'abūsan qamṭarīrā(n).
verses.translation: Поистине, страшимся мы Дня бедствия и скорби, (Что ниспадет) по воле нашего Владыки

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَوَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14179'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ شَرَّ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14180'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ نَضْرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14181'>ةً و</tajweed>َسُرُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa waqāhumullāhu syarra żālikal-yaumi wa laqqāhum naḍrataw wa surūrā(n).
verses.translation: И потому Аллах избавил их от бедствия и скорби того Дня, Пролив на лик их свет блаженства и радости (благословенной)

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَزَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14182'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِمَا صَبَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14183'>ةً و</tajweed>َحَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa jazāhum bimā ṣabarū jannataw wa ḥarīrā(n).
verses.translation: За постоянство и терпимость их Вознаградил их Садом и шелками

verses.text_uthmani: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُّتَّكِــِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8058'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِكِ‌ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14184'>سًا و</tajweed>َلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Muttaki'īna fīhā 'alal-arā'ik(i), lā yarauna fīhā syamsaw wa lā zamharīrā(n).
verses.translation: (В Саду), на ложах возлегая, Им не терпеть уж боле никогда Ни зноя солнца и ни холода луны

verses.text_uthmani: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa dāniyatan 'alaihim ẓilāluhā wa żullilat quṭūfuhā tażlīlā(n).
verses.translation: Прикроет их (деревьев) тень; В смиренье полном перед ними Склонятся гроздья (райских) фруктов

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14185'>ِم ب</tajweed>ِـَٔـانِيَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14186'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12249'>ن ف</tajweed>ِضَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14187'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َأَكْوَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14188'>بٍ ك</tajweed>َانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۟
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yuṭāfu 'alaihim bi'āniyatim min fiḍḍatiw wa akwābin kānat qawārīrā.
verses.translation: Им из серебряных сосудов (Льют питье) в хрустальные бокалы

verses.text_uthmani: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَوَارِيرَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12249'>ن ف</tajweed>ِضَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14189'>ةٍ ق</tajweed>َدَّرُوهَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9559'>قْ</tajweed>دِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qawārīra min fiḍḍatin qaddarūhā taqdīrā(n).
verses.translation: Из кубов серебра, сверкающих хрустальным блеском, Которые несут отметины о мере

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14190'>سًا ك</tajweed>َانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14191'>نج</tajweed>َبِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yusqauna fīhā ka'san kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlā(n).
verses.translation: И им дадут испить из чаш с добавкой имбиря

verses.text_uthmani: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَيْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14192'>نًا ف</tajweed>ِيهَا تُسَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َىٰ سَلْسَبِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Ainan fīhā tusammā salsabīlā(n).
verses.translation: Напиток, что там бьет фонтаном из ключа, Который именуют Сальсабиль

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْد<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13218'>نٌ م</tajweed>ُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14193'>بْ</tajweed>تَهُمْ لُؤْلُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14194'>ؤًا م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9614'>نث</tajweed>ُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yaṭūfu 'alaihim wildānum mukhalladūn(a), iżā ra'aitahum ḥasibtahum lu'lu'am manṡūrā(n).
verses.translation: Со всех сторон их Отроки, навечно (молодые), будут ублажать, Взглянув на коих вы сочтете, (Что чистотой своей и красотой) Они рассыпанным жемчужинам подобны

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ رَأَيْتَ نَعِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14195'>مًا و</tajweed>َمُلْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14196'>كًا ك</tajweed>َبِيرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iżā ra'aita ṡamma ra'aita  na'īmaw wa mulkan kabīrā(n).
verses.translation: А коль ты взглянешь, ты узришь услады (Рая) И ширь великую (владений Божьих)

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8054'>ند</tajweed>ُسٍ خُضْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14197'>رٌ و</tajweed>َإِسْتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14198'>بْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14199'>قٌ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َحُلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَسَاوِرَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12249'>ن ف</tajweed>ِضَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14200'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َسَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14201'>بًا ط</tajweed>َهُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Āliyahum ṡiyābu sundusin khuḍruw wa istabraq(un), wa ḥullū asāwira  min fiḍḍah(tin), wa saqāhum rabbuhum syarāban ṭahūrā(n).
verses.translation: Облечены они в зеленые одежды Из шелка (тонкого) и (расписной) парчи, Украшены браслетами из серебра, И им Господь их даст испить Напиток (райской) чистоты

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14202'>ءً و</tajweed>َكَانَ سَعْيُك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14203'>ُم م</tajweed>َّشْكُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna hāżā kāna lakum jazā'aw wa kāna sa'yukum masykūrā(n).
verses.translation: (И прозвучит): "Сие, поистине, награда вам, И ваше тщание (на промысле Аллаха) (Им) принято и воздано

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8434'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7929'>نز</tajweed>ِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā naḥnu nazzalnā 'alaikal-qur'āna tanzīlā(n).
verses.translation: (Поистине, о Мухаммад!), Мы по частям тебе Коран ниспосылаем

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Faṣbir liḥukmi rabbika wa lā tuṭi' minhum āṡiman au kafūrā(n).
verses.translation: (А потому) - Ты терпеливо жди указа твоего Владыки И не прислушивайся к тем средь них, Кто грешен иль неверен (пред Аллахом)

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>ذْكُرِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14032'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9566'>ةً و</tajweed>َأَصِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ważkurisma rabbika bukrataw wa aṣīlā(n).
verses.translation: И поминай Владыку твоего И по утрам, и в час вечерний

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7856'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14204'>ٱ</tajweed>سْجُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14204'>دْ</tajweed> لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْل<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14205'>اً ط</tajweed>َوِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa minal-laili fasjud lahū wa sabbiḥhu lailan ṭawīlā(n).
verses.translation: И ночью ниц пади пред Ним, И славь Его всей ночью долгой

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ؤُل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ يُحِبُّونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14206'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمْ يَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14207'>مًا ث</tajweed>َقِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna hā'ulā'i yuḥibbūnal-'ājilata wa yażarūna warā'ahum yauman ṡaqīlā(n)
verses.translation: Но их прельщает (тщЕта) проходящей (жизни), И тяжким Днем (Последнего Суда) они пренебрегают

verses.text_uthmani: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَّحْنُ خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11326'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ وَشَدَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11504'>دْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَسْرَهُمْ‌ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْثَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَهُمْ تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10752'>بْ</tajweed>دِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Naḥnu khalaqnāhum wa syadadnā asrahum, wa iżā syi'nā baddalnā amṡālahum tabdīlā(n).
verses.translation: Мы сотворили их и укрепили в целостном единстве, Но, если пожелаем Мы, Мы их заменим полною заменой - Подобными (по лику, но праведными пред Аллахом)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> تَذْكِرَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14055'>ةٌ‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8041'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14056'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> سَبِيلاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna hāżihī tażkirah(tun), faman syā'attakhaża ilā rabbihī sabīlā(n).
verses.translation: Вот таково предупреждение (Господне), И всяк, кто этого желает, Пусть следует стезей, ведущей в Его Рай

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُونَ إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4201'>َن ي</tajweed>َش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4334'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':80'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tasyā'ūna illā ay yasyā'allāh(u), innallāha kāna 'alīman ḥakīmā(n).
verses.translation: Но ни одно желанье ваше (В сей жизни) не найдет пути Иначе, как по изволению Аллаха, - Ведь мудр и всезнающ Он

verses.text_uthmani: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8947'>دْ</tajweed>خِلُ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':476'>َن ي</tajweed>َش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ فِى رَحْمَتِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14208'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yudkhilu may yasyā'u fī raḥmatih(ī),  waẓ-ẓālimīna a'adda lahum 'ażāban alīmā(n).
verses.translation: Введет Он в Свою милость того, кого сочтет, А скверным уготовил тяжкую расплату
